extends Element

    Class that represents the exit element in the maze
    Author:
    Pedro Costa

    • Constructor Detail

      • Exit

        public Exit(int x,
            int y,
            char figure)
        Exit constructor. Calls superclass Element constructor, to set X, Y and the char Figure.
        Parameters:
        x - Exit's X value
        y - Exit's Y value
        figure - Character that represents the dragon on the maze array (usually a 'S')
